string.text: This literacy check helps you to assess your literacy skills. You will get an indication on what you are capable of and what you can improve.
Advice and tips on how to get better
Look through your answers in the test
You have assessed yourself on level 3 out of 3 in this check.
Literacy skills on level 3 mean that you manage a variety of texts. You read and write in an independent, critical and flexible manner.
You have assessed yourself on level 2 out of 3 in this check.
Literacy skills on level 2 mean that you can read and write texts with a clear structure. You can use reading and writing in most situations.
You have assessed yourself on level 1 out of 3 levels in this check.
Literacy skills on level 1 mean that you can read and write short and familiar texts.
